title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CloudStorageOptions\FileSet
name: FileSet
description:
Set of files to scan.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CloudStorageOptions.FileSet

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.url
params.description: The Cloud Storage url of the file(s) to scan, in the format gs://<bucket>/<path>. Trailing wildcard in the path is allowed. If the url ends in a trailing slash, the bucket or directory represented by the url will be scanned non-recursively (content in sub-directories will not be scanned). This means that gs://mybucket/ is equivalent to gs://mybucket/*, and gs://mybucket/directory/ is equivalent to gs://mybucket/directory/*. Exactly one of url or regex_file_set must be set.

params.name: data.regex_file_set
params.description: The regex-filtered set of files to scan. Exactly one of url or regex_file_set must be set.

methods.name: getUrl
methods.description:
The Cloud Storage url of the file(s) to scan, in the format gs://<bucket>/<path>. Trailing wildcard in the path is allowed.

If the url ends in a trailing slash, the bucket or directory represented by the url will be scanned non-recursively (content in sub-directories will not be scanned). This means that gs://mybucket/ is equivalent to gs://mybucket/*, and gs://mybucket/directory/ is equivalent to gs://mybucket/directory/*. Exactly one of url or regex_file_set must be set.
